companyName: Zembe, Distribuição e Soluções de Material Elétrico, Lda

partnerDetails.about:
ZEMBE is supplying the Portuguese market with electrical and electronic materials since 1978. Having started in Lisbon, it later expanded their activities to Faro and Portimão delegations, ensuring an effective coverage in the central and southern areas of Portugal. 

We are official distributors of the highest quality domestic and foreign main electrical manufacturers. In addition, offering a consumer focused service with an outstanding value and a competitive price quality ratio.

With more than 35 years of experience, Zembe has adapted and strategically implemented innovation to establish a continuous service improvement by enhancing efficiency and benefits to our partners.

SERVICES :

  • Industrial Automation
  • Electrical Boards
  • Lighting and Home Automation
  • Intercom and Intrusion detection
  • Mobility and Energy Efficiency
